title: The prime location you've been waiting for! Beautiful 2 bed, 1 bath!
posting_body: ['RENT:', '$1494/Month |', 'SIZE:', '1100 sq ft |', 'BEDROOMS:', '2 |', 'BATHROOMS:', '1', 'LEASE TERMS:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'ABOUT COMMUNITY:', 'Shadow Lake, professionally managed by Ventron Management, offers 1 and 2 bedroom floor plans with many options including a patio or sunroom.', 'Other interior features include full size washer and dryer connections, optional fireplaces, decorative chair rails in the dining areas and optional upgrades.', 'Pet Policy: We accept 2 pets with a max weight of 50lbs.', 'and a pet fee of $300 and a monthly pet rent of $15.', 'UNIT FEATURES:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Breakfast Bar', '◾ Ceiling Fans', '◾ Dishwasher', '◾ Disposal', '◾ Patio/Balcony', '◾ Refrigerator/Ice Maker', '◾ Sunroom', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Extended living room area', '◾ Fireplace in Select Units', '◾ Fully Equipped Kitchens', '◾ Hardwood Floors', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾', 'In Unit Washer & Dryer', '◾ Upgrade Unit', '◾ Vaulted Ceilings in Select Units', '◾ Views', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Cable/Satellite Available', '◾ Central Air', '◾ Clubhouse', '◾ Dogs & Cats Welcome', '◾ Fitness Center', '◾ Picnic Area with Grill', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '◾ Tennis Courts', '◾ Clothes Care Center', '◾ Lake on Site', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ MARTA Access', '◾ Pet Care', '◾ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '◾ Scenic Lake', '◾ Se Habla Espanol', '◾ Walking Distance to Pleasantdale Park', '◾ Wooded Views', 'CONTACT US TODAY!', 'Shadow Lake', '3515 Pleasantdale Rd.', 'Doraville, GA 30340', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Professionally managed by Ventron Management', 'Admin Fee: $135', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AA82EC995909455']
